<h1 align="center">
  Discord Bot Server Checker
</h1>

A quick little Gatsby page to let you see which servers have added your Discord Bot.

#### Usage

Grab your Bot's token by

1. Heading to https://discord.com/developers/applications
2. Clicking on your App and heading into the **Bot** setting panel
3. Reveal/Copy token
4. Paste into the search bar of this website

#### Note

No data is stored, hence the code is open source.

#### Author

[chakrakan](https://github.com/chakrakan/)
